trans-unit.source: Represents a wrapper used to establish link between an actual <xref href="System.Drawing.Presentation.ToolboxItem"></xref> instance and the tool representation, as well as add support for categorization of toolbox items.
This class is `sealed`, so it cannot be inherited.
This wrapper class provides support for the categorization of toolbox items when re-hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]outside of [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> class.

The default constructor initializes the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.DisplayName%2A> properties with an empty `string`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> class with the type of the tool.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A> properties can be extracted from the `toolType` parameter.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.DisplayName%2A> properties are each initialized with an empty `string`.
The type of the tool.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> class with the type of the tool and a specified display name.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A> properties can be extracted from the `toolType` parameter.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.BitmapName%2A> property is initialized with an empty `string`.
The type of the tool.
The name of the display.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> class with the type of the tool and specified names for the bitmap and display.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.AssemblyName%2A> properties can be extracted from the `toolType` parameter.
The type of the tool.
A `string` that contains the name of the bitmap.
A `string` that contains the name of the display.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> class with specified names for the tool, assembly, bitmap, and display.
The name of the tool.
The name of the assembly.
The name of the bitmap.
The name of the display.
Gets or sets the assembly name for the toolbox item.
If the assembly name is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property value has been changed.
The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.
The assembly name.
The assembly name has already been specified and cannot be changed after the corresponding <xref href="System.Drawing.Desigen.ToolboxItem"></xref> has been initialized.
Gets the bitmap associated with the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> wrapped by the current object.
Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
Gets or sets the bitmap name.
If the bitmap name is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property value has been changed.
The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.
The bitmap name.
Gets or sets the display name.
If the display name is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property has been changed.
The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.
The display name.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> is valid.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is valid if it is not `null`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> is valid; otherwise, `false`.
An event that occurs when a property is changed.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.PropertyChanged> property is defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface that is implemented by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper> class.
Gets or sets the name of the tool.
If the name of the tool is changed, an event is raised to indicate that the property value has been changed.
The set operation is idempotent: if the assembly name is set to a value that it already has, there is no change.
The tool name.
The name of the tool cannot be changed after the corresponding <xref href="System.Drawing.Desigen.ToolboxItem"></xref> has been initialized.
Returns a `string` that represents the current object.

Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper.ToolName"></xref> property for the current <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxItemWrapper"></xref> object.
Gets the type of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
Returns <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
